subject: Movies
Costumes
lead_paragraph: Mark Bridges dressed the women of “Inherent Vice” in one “sexy number after the other” because he wanted to give life to the vivid, psychedelic world created by the book’s author, Thomas Pynchon.
snippet: Mark Bridges dressed the women of “Inherent Vice” in one “sexy number after the other” because he wanted to give life to the vivid, psychedelic world created by the book’s author, Thomas Pynchon.
